subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Williams spoke of creating “new memories” after defeating Monica Niculescu, 7-5, 7-5, in her first tournament appearance at Indian Wells since the 2001 final.
snippet: Williams spoke of creating “new memories” after defeating Monica Niculescu, 7-5, 7-5, in her first tournament appearance at Indian Wells since the 2001 final.
